summary: This mod add a MCM menu about a camera switcher between 1st and 3rd person view. Fully customizable.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to

MannyGT\'s Mods

[size=6]AUTO CAMERA SWITCHER[/size]
[img]http://s11.postimg.org/mpxwhnwpv/900_auto_camera.jpg[/img]
This image says it all!
[/center]

[color=red]THIS MOD REQUIRES THE LATEST VERSION OF SKSE AND SKYUI[/color]

* OVERVIEW *
This mod add a MCM menu about a camera switcher between 1st and 3rd person view. Fully customizable.

* HOW IT WORKS *
Enter the MCM menu and make your choices for:

- Fist (= unequipped)
- Sword
- Axe
- Mace
- Dagger
- Greatsword
- Battle Axe or Warhammer
- Bow
- Crossbow
- Staff
- Spell

Available option for every menu:

- Do nothing (does exactly nothing)
- Use 1st person view (switch the camera to 1st person view when you equip the selected weapon type)
- Use 3rd person view (swtich the camera to 3rd person view when you eqiup the selected weapon type)

* INSTALL *
Unpack ESP and BSA in data folder and enable the mod via Menu Launcher

* UNINSTALL *
This mod is safe to be uninstalled without doing anything. However I recommend to set all the options to \"Do Nothing\" before uninstalling.

* COMPATIBILITY *
This mod is fully compatible with all the camera mods like positioning the camera.

* BUGS *
Please report to me if you find any bug. Thank you!

* FACEBOOK*
https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods

Join me!
author: MannyGT
